alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 28 at 1:30AM PST until November 28 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Francisco, North Bay Interior Valleys and San Francisco Bay Shoreline Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running about a third to two-thirds above predictions. By high tide Tuesday morning (peaking at around 11 AM PST), there will likely to be more minor coastal flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
